```{r}
library(MASS)
library(ISLR2)
rm(list=ls())
attach(Boston)
```

15a) zn, indus, nox, rm,  age, dis, rad, tax are significant variables
```{r}
summary(lm(crim~zn))
summary(lm(crim~indus))
summary(lm(crim~chas))
summary(lm(crim~nox))
summary(lm(crim~rm))
summary(lm(crim~age))
summary(lm(crim~dis))
summary(lm(crim~rad))
summary(lm(crim~tax))
summary(lm(crim~ptratio))
summary(lm(crim~lstat))
summary(lm(crim~medv))
pairs(Boston)

```

b) zn, dis, rad, medv
```{r}
multimodel = lm(crim~zn+indus+chas+nox+rm+age+dis+rad+tax+ptratio+lstat+medv)
summary(multimodel)
```
d) no evidence to suggest non-linear association with rad
```{r}
model1 = lm(crim~rad+I(rad^2)+I(rad^3))
summary(model1)
```
